they might have thought that whales are fish instead of
mammals. Thus, if their intentions are what the legislators consciously had in
mind, then we also need to consider the deeper, more general purposeof the
legislators—the goal they were trying to reach or the moral outlook they were
trying to express. This purpose is revealed by the wider historical context and
by other laws made by the same legislature. In our example, the purpose of the
statute was obviously to provide a healthy environme
